example.text: Small State and Rural Rescue Act : This bipartisan legislation would bolster the role of FEMA’s Small State and Rural Advocate to ensure disaster-impacted communities have fair access to federal relief programs. Specifically, the bill authorizes a pilot program at certain foreign airports that permits passengers and their property to continue on additional flights in the US without additional, domestic security re-screening.
